thread.title: Fox London offices raided in antitrust probe

title: Fox London offices raided in antitrust probe
text:
Fox London offices raided in antitrust probe 3:36am EDT - 01:07 
Authorities have raided the offices of several companies related to sports broadcasting across the European Union as part of an antitrust investigation, including a unit of Rupert Murdoch's Fox Network. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Authorities have raided the offices of several companies related to sports broadcasting across the European Union as part of an antitrust investigation, including a unit of Rupert Murdoch's Fox Network.
